questions.explain_ar: الفقرة تقول: short, focused sessions are often more effective.
questions.passage:
Passage:
Many students think that studying longer always leads to higher scores. However, research suggests that short, focused sessions are often more effective. questions.prompt: Goals should be realistic because unrealistic goals may ____.
questions.explain_ar: النص: motivation can drop quickly.
questions.passage:
Passage:
Goal setting is useful, but goals must be realistic. If a learner sets a very high target without a plan, motivation can drop quickly. A better approach is to break a big goal into smaller tasks and track progress each week. Celebrating small improvements can keep learners confident and consistent.
